title: Docker container failed to launch sandisland.launch file

content.raw:
When I run `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch` inside of the osrf/vrx docker container I get an error saying “Failed to connect to master…”.

\[Msg\] Waiting for master.  
\[ INFO\] \[1572050666.288746128\]: waitForService: Service \[/gazebo\_gui/set\_physics\_properties\] has not been advertised, waiting...  
\[gazebo-2\] process has died \[pid 707, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo\_ros/gzserver --verbose -e ode /home/developer/vrx\_ws/devel/share/vrx\_gazebo/worlds/stationkeeping\_task.world \_\_name:=gazebo \_\_log:=/home/developer/.ros/log/c0bc0cf0-f789-11e9-ba39-0242ac110002/gazebo-2.log\].  
log file: /home/developer/.ros/log/c0bc0cf0-f789-11e9-ba39-0242ac110002/gazebo-2\*.log  
process\[spawn\_model-4\]: started with pid \[776\]  
the rosdep view is empty: call 'sudo rosdep init' and 'rosdep update'  
\[Err\] \[[ConnectionManager.cc:119](http://ConnectionManager.cc:119)\] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.  
\[Err\] \[gazebo\_shared.cc:83\] Unable to initialize transport.  
\[Err\] \[gazebo\_client.cc:62\] Unable to setup Gazebo
content.html:
When I run roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch inside of the osrf/vrx docker container I get an error saying “Failed to connect to master…”.

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[ INFO] [1572050666.288746128]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo_gui/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
[gazebo-2] process has died [pid 707, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver --verbose -e ode /home/developer/vrx_ws/devel/share/vrx_gazebo/worlds/stationkeeping_task.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/developer/.ros/log/c0bc0cf0-f789-11e9-ba39-0242ac110002/gazebo-2.log].
log file: /home/developer/.ros/log/c0bc0cf0-f789-11e9-ba39-0242ac110002/gazebo-2*.log
process[spawn_model-4]: started with pid [776]
the rosdep view is empty: call 'sudo rosdep init' and 'rosdep update'
[Err] [ConnectionManager.cc:119] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.
[Err] [gazebo_shared.cc:83] Unable to initialize transport.
[Err] [gazebo_client.cc:62] Unable to setup Gazebo
